trans-unit.source: Provides a way for developers to declare static connections in a content page when a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control has been declared in the content page's associated master page.
trans-unit.target: Consente agli sviluppatori di dichiarare static le connessioni in un contenuto pagina quando un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> è stato dichiarato controllo pagina master associata alla pagina di contenuto.

trans-unit.source: The ProxyWebPartManager control exists for the particular scenario of declaring static connections in content pages when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control has already been declared in a master page.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo è disponibile per lo scenario di dichiarare connessioni statiche nel contenuto di ProxyWebPartManager pagine quando un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo è già stato dichiarato in una pagina master.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: By design, a Web page that uses Web Parts controls must contain one (and only one) <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control that manages all Web Parts controls on the page.
trans-unit.target: Per impostazione predefinita, una pagina Web che utilizza controlli Web part deve contenere (una sola) <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo che gestisce tutti i controlli Web part nella pagina.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: When a Web Parts application uses master pages, it is common to place the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control in the master page, because all the content pages are merged with the master page at run time and the single <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control will manage all the Web Parts controls from all content pages.
trans-unit.target: Quando un'applicazione Web part utilizza pagine master, è comune per inserire il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo nella pagina master, perché tutte le pagine di contenuto vengono unite con la pagina master in fase di esecuzione e il singolo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo gestirà tutti i controlli Web part da tutte le pagine di contenuto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: However, when developers want to declare static connections in the content pages of such an application, they might seem to face a limitation.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, quando gli sviluppatori di dichiarare connessioni statiche nelle pagine di contenuto di tale applicazione, potrebbe sembrare ad affrontare una limitazione.

trans-unit.source: A static Web Parts connection can be declared only by adding an <`asp:webpartconnection>` element as a child of a `<staticconnections>` element, which itself must be a child of a `<asp:webpartmanager>` element.
trans-unit.target: Una connessione Web part statica può essere dichiarata solo aggiungendo un `asp:webpartconnection>` come elemento figlio di un `<staticconnections>` elemento, che a sua volta deve essere un elemento figlio di un `<asp:webpartmanager>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: But because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control was already declared in the master page, and is the one permitted <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control, developers cannot declare additional <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> controls in the content pages to add static connections.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, poiché il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo è già stato dichiarato nella pagina master ed è quello consentito <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo, è possibile dichiarare aggiuntive <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlli nelle pagine di contenuto per aggiungere connessioni statiche.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The ProxyWebPartManager control takes the place of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control in this scenario.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo ProxyWebPartManager prende il posto di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo in questo scenario.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Developers declare an `<asp:proxywebpartmanager>` element instead of an `<asp:webpartmanager>` element in their content pages, and can then declare static connections as child elements.
trans-unit.target: Gli sviluppatori di dichiarano un `<asp:proxywebpartmanager>` elemento anziché un `<asp:webpartmanager>` elemento le pagine di contenuto e può quindi dichiarare connessioni statiche come elemento figlio elementi.

trans-unit.source: At run time, the connections in the ProxyWebPartManager control are simply added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control and treated like any other connection.
trans-unit.target: In fase di esecuzione, le connessioni nel controllo ProxyWebPartManager sono semplicemente aggiunto al <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A>insieme il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllare e trattato come qualsiasi altra connessione.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because the ProxyWebPartManager control is used only in this particular development scenario, it has more limited functionality than the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class.
trans-unit.target: Poiché il controllo di ProxyWebPartManager è utilizzato solo in questo particolare scenario di sviluppo, esso è più limitate funzionalità di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: In fact, although the ProxyWebPartManager control acts as a proxy to contain static connections for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control in content pages, it does not inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: In realtà, anche se il controllo ProxyWebPartManager funge da proxy per le connessioni statiche per contenere il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo nelle pagine di contenuto, non eredita dal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: It inherits directly from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> class, and overrides only a few of the base members.
trans-unit.target: Eredita direttamente dalla <xref:System.Web.UI.Control>classe ed esegue l'override solo alcuni dei membri di base.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.EnableTheming%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.Visible%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.SkinID%2A> properties are overridden and assigned values that prevent them from being used.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.EnableTheming%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.Visible%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.SkinID%2A>proprietà sono sottoposto a override e assegnate valori che ne impediscono in uso.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.SkinID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.Visible%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.EnableTheming%2A>

trans-unit.source: Other inherited properties are overridden to adjust their design-time behavior, but otherwise they have the same behavior as the base properties.
trans-unit.target: Altre proprietà ereditate vengono sottoposte a override per modificare il proprio comportamento in fase di progettazione, ma in caso contrario hanno lo stesso comportamento come le proprietà di base.

trans-unit.source: These include the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.Controls%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.ClientID%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Queste includono la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.Controls%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.ClientID%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.ClientID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.Controls%2A>

trans-unit.source: Finally, the ProxyWebPartManager class has one non-inherited property.
trans-unit.target: Infine, la classe ProxyWebPartManager ha una proprietà non ereditata.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A> property returns its own collection of static connections (a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection> object).
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A>proprietà restituisce la propria raccolta di connessioni statiche (un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection>oggetto).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A>

trans-unit.source: As for methods, the ProxyWebPartManager class similarly overrides only a few methods, mostly to restrict their use.
trans-unit.target: Come per i metodi, la classe ProxyWebPartManager esegue l'override solo di alcuni metodi, principalmente per limitarne l'uso.

trans-unit.source: The inherited <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.Focus%2A> method is made unusable by throwing an exception if called.
trans-unit.target: Ereditato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.Focus%2A>metodo diventa inutilizzabile generando un'eccezione se viene chiamato.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.Focus%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.CreateControlCollection%2A> method always returns an empty control collection, which has the effect of preventing it from being able to contain a collection of controls.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.CreateControlCollection%2A>metodo restituisce sempre un insieme di controlli vuoto, che ha l'effetto della mancata in grado di contenere una raccolta di controlli.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.CreateControlCollection%2A>

trans-unit.source: Finally, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.OnInit%2A> method calls the base method, and then assigns the collection of connections referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A> property to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: Infine, il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.OnInit%2A>metodo chiama il metodo di base e quindi assegna la raccolta di connessioni a cui fa riferimento il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A>proprietà per il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.OnInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: This has the effect of rolling up all the static connections declared in all content pages and making them part of the connections collection maintained by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control in the master page.
trans-unit.target: Questo ha l'effetto di rollup di tutte le connessioni statiche dichiarate in tutte le pagine di contenuto e rendendoli parte della raccolta di connessioni gestite dal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo nella pagina master.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control ID for HTML markup that is generated by ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'ID di controllo per il markup HTML generato da ASP.NET.

trans-unit.source: The control ID for HTML markup that is generated by ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: L'ID di controllo per il markup HTML generato da ASP.NET.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"></xref> object that represents the child controls for a specified server control in the UI hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"> </xref> oggetto che rappresenta i controlli figlio per un controllo server specificato nella gerarchia dell'interfaccia utente.

trans-unit.source: The collection of child controls for the specified server control.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta di controlli figlio per il controllo server specificato.

trans-unit.source: Overrides the base property to prevent the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager"></xref> control from containing controls.
trans-unit.target: Esegue l'override di proprietà di base per impedire la <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager"> </xref> controllo contenga controlli.

trans-unit.source: The CreateControlCollection method overrides the base method to prevent the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager> control from containing and returning collections of controls.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo CreateControlCollection esegue l'override del metodo di base per impedire il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager>controllo contenga e restituzione di raccolte di controlli.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Its only purpose is to enable static connections to be declared in content pages within an application that uses master pages.
trans-unit.target: Il suo unico scopo è consentire connessioni statiche essere dichiarate nelle pagine di contenuto all'interno di un'applicazione che utilizza le pagine master.

trans-unit.source: Always returns an <xref href="System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce sempre un <xref href="System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Overrides the base property to prevent themes from being used.
trans-unit.target: Esegue l'override della proprietà di base per impedire l'utilizzo dei temi.

trans-unit.source: The EnableTheming property overrides the base property to prevent themes from being used with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà EnableTheming esegue l'override della proprietà di base per impedire l'utilizzo di temi con il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: This is to prevent it coming into conflict with any themes being used with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control in the master page (its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EnableTheming%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property always returns `true`).
trans-unit.target: Per impedire un conflitto con eventuali temi in uso con la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo nella pagina master (relativo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EnableTheming%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà restituisce sempre `true`).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EnableTheming%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, to prevent themes from being used.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce sempre <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, per impedire l'utilizzo dei temi.

trans-unit.source: A caller tries to assign a value to this property.
trans-unit.target: Un chiamante tenta di assegnare un valore per questa proprietà.

trans-unit.source: Overrides the base method to prevent the method from being called.
trans-unit.target: Esegue l'override del metodo di base per impedire che venga chiamato il metodo.

trans-unit.source: The Focus method overrides the base method and throws an exception if any caller attempts to call the method.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo lo stato attivo esegue l'override del metodo di base e genera un'eccezione se un chiamante tenta di chiamare il metodo.

trans-unit.source: This is because the inherited <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Focus%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method is designed for controls with a user interface (UI), but the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager> control has no UI and therefore has no need to set the focus.
trans-unit.target: Infatti, ereditato <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Focus%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodo è progettato per i controlli con un'interfaccia utente (UI), ma la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager>controllo non dispone di alcuna interfaccia utente e pertanto non è necessario che per impostare lo stato attivo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Focus%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A caller tries to call this method.
trans-unit.target: Un chiamante tenta di chiamare questo metodo.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Init"></xref> event and initializes the control.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Init"> </xref> evento e inizializza il controllo.

trans-unit.source: The OnInit method calls the base method, and then carries out tasks to initialize the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo OnInit chiama il metodo di base e quindi esegue le attività necessarie per inizializzare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: An important task of this method is to assign the collection of connections referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A> property to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: Un'attività importante di questo metodo consiste nell'assegnare la raccolta di connessioni a cui fa riferimento il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A>proprietà per il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>del controllo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A?displayProperty=fullName>insieme.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.EventArgs>che contiene i dati dell'evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control from the associated master page is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> controllo della pagina master associata è <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Overrides the base property to prevent a value from being assigned.
trans-unit.target: Esegue l'override della proprietà di base per impedire che venga assegnato un valore.

trans-unit.source: The SkinID property overrides the base property to prevent a value from being assigned to it, which has the effect of preventing skins from being used with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: Pelli SkinID proprietà esegue l'override della proprietà di base per impedire che un valore da assegnare a esso, che ha l'effetto di impedire l'uso con la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: This is done because the control never exposes a user interface (UI) on a page.
trans-unit.target: Questo avviene perché il controllo non espone un'interfaccia utente (UI) in una pagina.

trans-unit.source: The same behavior is implemented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control for its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SkinID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Lo stesso comportamento è implementato dal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllare per il relativo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SkinID%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SkinID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Always returns an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Restituisce sempre una stringa vuota ("").

trans-unit.source: A caller tries to assign a value to this property.
trans-unit.target: Un chiamante tenta di assegnare un valore per questa proprietà.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of static connections declared within the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<asp:proxywebpartmanager>" name="<asp:proxywebpartmanager>" href=""></xref> element on a content page.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una raccolta di connessioni statiche dichiarate all'interno di <xref uid="langword_csharp_<asp:proxywebpartmanager>" name="<asp:proxywebpartmanager>" href=""> </xref> elemento in una pagina contenuto.

trans-unit.source: The StaticConnections property references the collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> objects declared in an `<asp:proxywebpartmanager>` element.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà StaticConnections fa riferimento alla raccolta di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>gli oggetti dichiarati in un `<asp:proxywebpartmanager>` elemento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: The connections contained in this collection are added to the static connections of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> controls (referenced by its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection), and treated exactly like any other connections associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: Le connessioni contenute in questa raccolta vengono aggiunti alle connessioni statiche della <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlli (a cui fa riferimento il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A?displayProperty=fullName>insieme) e trattate esattamente come qualsiasi altra connessione associata al <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The declarative element that corresponds to the StaticConnections property is the `<staticconnections>` element.
trans-unit.target: L'elemento dichiarativo che corrisponde alla proprietà StaticConnections è il `<staticconnections>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: In an application that uses master pages, the `<staticconnections>` element is added as a child of the `<asp:proxywebpartmanager>` element on a content page, and an `<asp:webpartconnection>` element in turn is added as a child of the `<staticconnections>` element.
trans-unit.target: In un'applicazione che utilizza le pagine master, il `<staticconnections>` elemento viene aggiunto come elemento figlio di `<asp:proxywebpartmanager>` elemento in una pagina contenuta e un `<asp:webpartconnection>` elemento a sua volta viene aggiunto come figlio del `<staticconnections>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: Multiple `<asp:webpartconnection>` elements can be added to one `<staticconnections>` element, and multiple content pages can declare static connections as part of a master pages application.
trans-unit.target: Più `<asp:webpartconnection>` è possibile aggiungere elementi a una `<staticconnections>` elemento e a più pagine di contenuto possono dichiarare connessioni statiche come parte di un'applicazione di pagine master.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection"></xref> that contains all static <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> objects declared within an <xref uid="langword_csharp_<asp:proxywebpartmanager>" name="<asp:proxywebpartmanager>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection"> </xref> che contiene tutti statici <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> gli oggetti dichiarati all'interno di un <xref uid="langword_csharp_<asp:proxywebpartmanager>" name="<asp:proxywebpartmanager>" href=""> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: Overrides the base property to prevent a value from being assigned.
trans-unit.target: Esegue l'override della proprietà di base per impedire che venga assegnato un valore.

trans-unit.source: The Visible property overrides the base property to prevent the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager> control from ever being made visible.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà Visible esegue l'override di proprietà di base per impedire il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager>controllo venga visualizzato.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager> control, like the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control, has no user interface (UI) and is never displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager>controllare, ad esempio il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllare, non dispone di alcuna interfaccia utente (UI) e non viene mai visualizzato all'utente.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, to prevent the control from being made visible.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce sempre <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, per impedire il controllo.

trans-unit.source: A caller tries to assign a value to this property.
trans-unit.target: Un chiamante tenta di assegnare un valore per questa proprietà.
